COMPANY PROFILE
Ningbo Ruihua Electronics Plastics Co., Ltd is Sino - Sweden Joint-venture Enterprise established in 1994 which specializes in portable rechargable power stations / air compressors and etc series products. My company with rich production experiences and continously updated technology win the recognition of ISO9002 international quality management system and become a member of road communication safety institution. Portable power station / air compressor are our patent products
with CE safe certificate. Corresponding adapters have CE and GS safe certificates. My company enjoy good reputation in international market because of strict quality control system, advanced science technology / the latest style / fine quality / considerate service and honest credit. All products maily sell to the U. S / England / Jerman / French / Japan / European common / Australia / South Africa / Canada / HongKong and East-south Asia and etc other countries and districts. Our general Manager with all employees sincerely welcome clients from domestic and oversea to arrive in our company for instructions.
MAIN PRODUCTS/SERVICE

results.title: Ningbo Ruihua Electronics Plastics Co., Ltd. v. Charles Hwang et al.

results.raw_content:
Ningbo Ruihua Electronics Plastics Co., Ltd. v. Charles Hwang et al.
Case Summary
On March 30, 2022, Ningbo Ruihua Electronics Plastics Co., Ltd.,(“Plaintiff” or “Ruihua”), represented by David J. Tsai of Pillsbury Winthrop Shaw Pittman LLP, filed an intellectual property lawsuit against Charles Hwang a.k.a han-Chieh Hwang a.k.a Hanjie Huang (“Hwang”) and John/ Jane Doe(s) (collectively,“Defendants”), seeking declaratory and injunctive relief and damages along with costs for the alleged infringement of the United States Patent owned by Plaintiff. This case was filed in the U.S. District Court in the Central District of California with Judges John W. Holcomb and Shashi H. Kewalramani presiding.
The plaintiff filed this complaint for the alleged infringement of U.S. Patent No.9,407,102  (“the ’102 Patent”) owned by the plaintiff.
In the complaint the plaintiff alleged, “Founded in 1994 in Ningbo, China, Ruihua is a leading designer and manufacturer of lead-acid and lithium-ion jump starter products and accessories. Ruihua launched its first jump starter products in 1998. Since then, Ruihua has continued to develop and advance its innovative core technology for battery charging and jumper cable designs under the leadership of Ruihua’s Co-Founder and President, Mr. Senliao Lou.”
The plaintiff further alleged, “Specifically, on January 21, 2013, Ruihua filed a Chinese utility model patent application on the main structure and key components, which later issued on August 7, 2013, as Chinese Utility Model Patent No. CN203119522U (‘the ’522U Patent’). A true and correct copy of the ’522U Patent and a certified translation thereof are attached as Exhibits A and B, respectively.”
The plaintiff also filed three more patent applications for Chinese Design Patent No. CN302435617S (“the ’617S Patent”); Chinese Design Patent No. CN302535063S (“the ’063S Patent”); Chinese Patent No. CN103456905B (“the ’905 Patent”).
The plaintiff also alleged, “Also unbeknownst to Ruihua, Hwang used Ruihua’s trade secrets to apply for a provisional patent in his own name in the United States on September 27,  2013, which ultimately issued on August 2, 2016, as U.S. Patent No. 9,407,102 (‘the ’102 Patent’). In particular, Hwang disclosed Ruihua’s trade secrets relating to its battery connection design and voltage source design, including figures used in Ruihua’s then unpublished Chinese patent application for the ’905 Patent. A true and correct copy of the ’102 Patent is attached as Exhibit I.”
The plaintiff also alleged that “certain unknown John/Jane Doe Defendants unlawfully acted in concert with Hwang to obtain and disclose Ruihua’s confidential proprietary technologies, including the battery connection design, the voltage source design and Ruihua’s early designs of its 55 Series products, including the design of externally connected air compressors.”
The plaintiff brought four claims for relief. The first claim is for alleged correction of inventorship under 35 U.S.C. § 256. The second claim is for alleged declaration of ownership of the ’102 Patent Under 28 U.S.C. §§ 2201 and 2202. The third and fourth claims are for alleged misappropriation of trade secrets under the Defend Trade Secrets Act and California Uniform Trade Secrets Act.
In their prayer for relief the plaintiff has requested declaration and correction of ownership of the ’102 Patent and enjoining the Defendants from using Plaintiff’s confidential information. The plaintiff also requested an award of actual and exemplary damages along with costs and attorneys’ fees or any other such relief that the court deems appropriate.
This is a summary of a legal complaint. All statements, claims, and allegations listed herein reflect the position of the plaintiff only and do not represent the position of UniCourt. Additionally, this case summary may not reflect the current position of the parties to this litigation or the current status of this case. To view the latest case updates and court documents, please sign up for a UniCourt account.

About
Ningbo Ruihua Electronics Plastics Co.,Ltd.
Ruihua company pioneers a new way to change people’s life with smart lithium jump starter and regular jump starter. We deep understanding of how frustrating when you are out but your car can’t start, enable us to delivery innovation to unlock new business value to customers. CARKU is the world's leading jump starter designer and manufacturer. We devoted ourselves to focusing on battery safety technology and jump starter design to extensively use in the area of automotive, motorcycle, consumer electronics, outdoor recreational enthusiasts, and recreational boaters.
Our R&D team with professional battery experience over 20 years developed core intelligent technology (DSLI technology),which ensures many safety guarantees of the products with its microcomputer controlled program including short-circuit protection, overcharging protection, energy-saving protection and capacity management, is to protect our mini starters from damage or improper operation and guarantee longer life cycles and safety.
Ruihua is a historied and ambitious enterprise. With 20-year development, SANSEN brand is recognized by all over the world and occupies great global market share, including Europe, North America, South America, Asia, Africa and Oceania.
